import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { listProductDetails } from '../redux/actions/productActions' import { Row, Col, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; const ProductDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); console.log("id ::", id); const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails) console.log("productDetails ::", productDetails); const { loading, product, error } = productDetails log useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(id)) }, [dispatch]) return (
  Go Back

{product.name}

Price : ${product.price} {product.description} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In stock' : 'Out of stock'}
) } export default ProductDetails;
